model.player



class Player;
The instance of this class contains all the data about player state.

immutable long id;
Returns:
the unique player Id.

immutable bool me;
Returns:
true
if and only if this is your player.

immutable string name;
Returns:
the name of the player.

immutable bool strategyCrashed;
Returns:
true
if and only if the strategy of this player is crashed.

immutable int score;
Returns:
the amount of score points.

immutable Faction faction;
Returns:
the faction of this player.
